full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title
Litigation Research Analysis, Litigation Research Services and Document Management Services
#### Reference Number
cb-6035-29025382

#### Notice Type
This is a Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB), set aside for Indigenous Business Requirements.

#### Description of the Requirement
Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada (CIRNAC) is seeking a Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) for Litigation Research Analysis, Litigation Research Services, and Document Management Services.

#### Services Required
The services required include:

* Research Analysis
* Research Services
* Document Management Services

#### Security Requirements
There are two levels of security requirements associated with this requirement, outlined in Part 6 – Security Requirements and Part 7 - Standing Offer and Resulting Contract Clauses.

#### Trade Agreements
This procurement is set aside from international trade agreements, specifically Article 800 of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Contract Duration
The Standing Offer has a proposed period from the date of award to March 31, 2026, with an option to extend for two (2) additional one-year periods under the same conditions.

#### Notice Details
* Publication Date: 2023-05-31
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-07-25T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-04-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2026-03-31
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR), Calgary, Vancouver

#### Contractor Details
* Contracting Entity Name: Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada
* Contact Information:
	+ First Name: Vanessa
	+ Last Name: Demers-Lamothe
	+ Email: vanessa.demers-lamothe@sac-isc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (873) 355-2467
	+ Fax: None
	+ Address: 10 Wellington Street, Gatineau, Quebec.

#### Attachments
Attachments are available on the Canada Buys website.
